data.message: Bad!! Bad Marshall!! Seek God and find peace 😉 Violence and anger aren't the only forms of entertainment! Still a big fan 😜

replies.message: he wouldnt be Marshall/slim/eminem. y if you sensor what he has to say. it's what he has to say  that makes him the RAP GOD..I have been teaching my grand daughter..., Lose yourself..  5yrs old Im already teaching her to cease  the moment  a positive song about not missing your chance in life.. no violence there or anger..  Marshall I want nothing from you except to say thank you.. you brought me back to music. after  my husband died, there was no music for 4 years.. you helped me let go of bad pennies such as family nasty friends.. I have a new outlook and I truly thank you for what you did for me........ KEEP ON .RAPPING ...  greatful... thanks
